title: Grid Component
description: Understand how to create responsive grid layouts.

meta.title: LNGRZUI - Grid Component Documentation
meta.description: Understand how to create responsive grid layouts.
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: The Grid component offers a flexible and responsive grid system for organizing and aligning content on a web page. This page outlines the features and capabilities of the Grid component, including defining grid layouts, responsive behavior, and column alignment. It empowers developers to create dynamic and visually appealing grid-based layouts.
content.how-to-desc: Import the Grid component into your project and define the desired grid structure by specifying the number of columns, rows, and their respective sizes. Utilize the provided props to control the responsiveness and alignment of the grid. Refer to the documentation for specific usage examples and guidance.
content.sample-code:
import React from 'react';
import { Row, Col, Card, Utility } from 'ui';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <> 
      <Row> 
        <Col span={12}> 
          <Utility padding={40}>Content</Utility> 
        </Col> 
        <Col span={12}> 
          <Utility padding={40}>Content</Utility> 
        </Col> 
      </Row> 
      <Row justify='center'> 
        <Col xs={24} sm={12} md={8} lg={6} xl={4}> 
          <Utility padding={40}>Content</Utility> 
        </Col> 
        <Col xs={24} sm={12} md={8} lg={6} xl={4}> 
          <Utility padding={40}>Content</Utility> 
        </Col> 
        <Col xs={24} sm={12} md={8} lg={6} xl={4}> 
          <Utility padding={40}>Content</Utility> 
        </Col> 
        <Col xs={24} sm={12} md={8} lg={6} xl={4}> 
          <Utility padding={40}>Content</Utility> 
        </Col> 
        <Col xs={12} sm={12} md={8} lg={6} xl={4}> 
          <Utility padding={40}>Content</Utility> 
        </Col> 
        <Col xs={12} sm={12} md={8} lg={6} xl={4}> 
          <Utility padding={40}>Content</Utility> 
        </Col> 
      </Row> 
      <Row gap={10}> 
        <Col lg={8} xl={12} olg={8} oxl={12}> 
          <Card>Content</Card> 
        </Col> 
      </Row> 
    </> 
  )
}
